sn47.35:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.35:2.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.35:2.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sato hoti.
sn47.35:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno vidita vedana uppajjanti, vidita upatthahanti, vidita abbhattham gacchanti.
sn47.35:3.3: Vidita vitakka uppajjanti, vidita upatthahanti, vidita abbhattham gacchanti.
sn47.35:3.4: Vidita sanna uppajjanti, vidita upatthahanti, vidita abbhattham gacchanti.
sn47.35:3.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajano hoti.
